page.title: 08RECREATION SURVEY - MARTON
page.content: The children questioned 122 adults and 108 children in the Marton area about their leisure and recreational activities. 48% of the adults surveyed took part in a sport on a regular basis, the 4 most popular sports being 1.Squash 2.Football 3.Swimming and 4.Badminton. Most other sports were represented in the survey. Of the children 64% took part in sporting activities on a regular basis the top 4 sports being 1.Swimming 2.Football 3.Cricket and 4.Tennis. The survey also involved questions about hobbies. The 3 most popular hobbies for adults were found to be 1.Reading 2.Gardening and 3.Knitting, with a wide range of other hobbies represented. The 3 most popular hobbies for children were 1.Computers 2.Drawing and 3.Reading. 64% of the children belonged to a leisure time club of some kind.
